title: Hitler's philosophers, and a Bronze Age boat
itunes:title: Hitler's philosophers, and a Bronze Age boat
itunes:subtitle: Yvonne Sherratt explains why German thinkers were enraptured by the Nazis, while Robert Van De Noort introduces a project to recreate a Bronze Age boat. Presented by Rob Attar
description:
Yvonne Sherratt explains why German thinkers were enraptured by the Nazis, while Robert Van De Noort introduces a project to recreate a Bronze Age boat. Presented by Rob Attar
